title: Warm Blankets for Rangpur
description: Help us provide warm blankets to 500 families in rural Rangpur district.

title: Winter Clothes for Street Children in Dhaka
description: Support our efforts to distribute winter clothes to 1000 street children in Dhaka city.

title: Warm Meals for Elderly in Sylhet
description: Provide warm meals and clothing to 200 elderly individuals in Sylhet during the cold season.

title: Coats for Kids in Chittagong
description: Help us provide warm coats to 300 underprivileged children in Chittagong.

title: Warm Shelter for Homeless in Khulna
description: Support our initiative to set up warm shelters for 100 homeless individuals in Khulna city.

title: Emergency Winter Relief for Rajshahi
description: Urgent support needed to provide winter essentials to 400 families affected by recent cold wave in Rajshahi.

title: Warm Socks Drive in Mymensingh
description: Join our campaign to collect and distribute warm socks to 1000 low-income workers in Mymensingh.

title: Heaters for Schools in Barisal
description: Help us install heaters in 20 underfunded schools in Barisal to keep students warm during winter classes.

title: Winter Health Camp in Comilla
description: Support our winter health camp providing free check-ups and warm clothing to 500 people in rural Comilla.

title: Blanket Distribution in Bogra
description: Help us distribute warm blankets to 300 families living in slum areas of Bogra city.

title: Winter Clothing for Tea Garden Workers
description: Provide warm winter clothing to 400 tea garden workers and their families in Sylhet division.

title: Warm Meals for Rohingya Refugees
description: Support our initiative to provide warm meals and blankets to 1000 Rohingya refugees in Cox's Bazar during winter.
